cast.name: 罗宾·威廉姆斯 Robin Williams

writer.name: 罗宾·威廉姆斯 Robin Williams

this_title: Robin Williams: Weapons of Self Destruction
trans_title: 罗宾·威廉姆斯：自毁武器
introduction: In this comedy special taped at DAR Constitution Hall, his first solo special on the network in seven years, Williams covers such topics as global warming, sex and politics, the state of health care in the country (suggesting a cash for clunkers program for elderly relatives, among other things), drugs - recreational and otherwise - and more personal topics, including his recent heart surgery. Written by HBO Publicity
chinese_title: 罗宾·威廉姆斯：自毁武器
foreign_title: Robin Williams: Weapons of Self Destruction
